node.title: Here are the celebrity runners in this year’s marathon.
node.alt: The retired Giants running back Tiki Barber will be running in his seventh New York City Marathon Sunday.
node.description: Former U.S. women’s national soccer team members, musicians from Mumford and Sons, and a Broadway star are among some of the bold names running in the New York City Marathon.
node.content: ["For the first time since the onset of the pandemic, tens of thousands of runners will hit the streets for the New York City Marathon, and celebrities and athletes will race alongside regular folks.", "The U.S. women\u2019s national soccer team has several Olympic gold medalists and World Cup winners running in this year\u2019s race, including its alumnae Abby Wambach, Lauren Holiday, Leslie Osborne and Kate Markgraf.", "The retired Giants running back Tiki Barber is a veteran marathoner who will run in his seventh in-person New York City Marathon this year. Christy Turlington, a model, activist and seasoned marathoner, will also compete.", "The Broadway actress and Tony Award-winner Kelli O\u2019Hara; the Grammy winning musicians Marcus Mumford and Ben Lovett of Mumford & Sons; as well as several contestants from \u201cThe Bachelor\u201d and \u201cThe Bachelorette\u201d franchises, including Tayshia Adams and Matt James, are also among the celebrities running. It is possible to track the race\u2019s celebrity runners using the event\u2019s official app, so long as they did not opt out of the tracking feature.", "Other notable runners include:"]
